channel.title: Appending to the right-click menu?
channel.description: Well, I pop in here once in a while with these ideas, and this time I was wondering did that Cruels.NET client ever get released, where they had added hiscore check or something like that to the right click menu? Any hints on how to accomplish this?

item.title: Appending to the right-click menu?
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

now that actions are stored a linked list you could easily have it added, however implementing functionality would be extending or detouring the method that processes the next action

Read full topic
